title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 
(Minister for Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media) (No. 2) 
Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport media) (no 2) order 2020

title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: 2. Tanya Warren, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Tanya Warren, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and 
Media, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for Tourism, 
Culture, Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media with effect from 21st September
text_norm: 2 tanya warren particular whose address deposited office department tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium appointed special adviser minister tourism culture art gaeltacht sport medium effect 21st september

title: section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of 1997),
heading: GIVEN under my Official Seal of the Government,
text_raw:
2020. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal of the Government, 

13 October, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 
Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
 “Iris Oifigiúil”13th of October, 2020.
